title: Microlending portfolio grows 31 pc in December quarter: Report
description: In December, Mumbai's microlending portfolio reached Rs 4.02 lakh crore, led by NBFCs-MFI, banks, small finance banks, and NBFCs. Loans not serviced for over 30 days stand at 2%.
